name: Keak da Sneak
description:
'''Charles Kente Williams''' ({{ne}} '''Bowens'''; born October 21, 1977), better known by his stage name '''Keak da Sneak''', is an American rapper from [[Oakland, California]]. He is known for his gravelly voice, for coining the term "[[hyphy]]" in 1994, and for his contributions to the hyphy movement.

He has collaborated frequently with fellow West Coast rapper [[E-40]].
